From Wikipedia, the free encyclopedia

(Redirected from Switchh (2021 film))


2021 Indian filmSwitchhRelease PosterDirected byMustufa RajWritten by
Jaahan Kaur
Mustufa Raj
Produced byVinod AdnaniStarring
Naren Kumar
Vikrant Massey
Madhua Sneha
CinematographySunil PatelEdited byAsif Ali ShaikhMusic by
Bappi Lahiri
Amaal Mallik
ProductioncompanyNine Hope ProductionsDistributed byEros NowRelease date
23 April 2021 (2021-04-23)
Running time130 minutesCountryIndiaLanguageHindi
Switchh (stylised as SWITCHH) is a 2021 Indian Hindi-language action thriller film directed by Mustufa Raj starring Vikrant Massey.[1] It was produced by Nine Hope Productions and released digitally on Eros Now.[2]


Premise[edit]
Three con artists use their charm to dupe wealthy victims out of cash.

Cast[edit]
Vikrant Massey as Sam
Naren Kumar[3] as Neil Rai
Tanvi Vyas as Ruheena
Madhua Sneha as Myra
Hanif Hilal as Pacha
Armen Grayg
Reception[edit]
Ronak Kotecha of The Times of India gave it a poor review with 2 stars saying, "‘Switchh’ has been in the making for years and director Mustafa Raj makes no attempt to upgrade his product in any way".[4] Akhila Damodaran of OTT Play wrote that "The film, directed by Mustufa Raj, is poorly executed and drags for over two hours with over-the-top twists in the story".[5]

References[edit]


^ "Switchh trailer: Vikrant Massey stars in outdated con movie". The Indian Express. 9 March 2021. Retrieved 29 July 2021.

^ "Eros Now Announces its Biggest Content Slate, Underpinning Growth in the OTT Sector". www.businesswire.com. 11 December 2020. Retrieved 29 July 2021.

^ Naval-Shetye, Aakanksha (20 April 2021). "Switchh: Naren Kumar spills the beans on his Bollywood debut". FilmFare. Retrieved 2 August 2021.

^ "Switchh Review: A snoozefest that crash-lands before take off". The Times of India.

^ "Switchh review: This grisly and harrowing action thriller was unexpected from Vikrant Massey". OTT Play.
